Claim: "The Chinese 'airpocalypse' of 2013 peaked at an Air Quality Index of over 800."
Implication: "Smog was responsible for a third of all deaths in the country."
Referring expressions: Chinese, airpocalypse, Air Quality Index  Smog, country
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsChinese(a) and HasAirpocalypse(b) and HasAirQualityIndex(c))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsResponsibleFor(d) and HasDeaths(e))))
